name: Indy Month : Entire Racecar
description: Racecar sponsorship for all races run in iRacing Indycar races during the month of May, infamous for the running of the Indianapolis 500. Given the current COVID-19 global crisis, eSports / sim racing has exploded in growth. 0xRacing will be participating in multiple digial Indy 500 races and Indycar events. Company / brand will be featured across the entire racecar. Includes 2 social post per week, and overlays on Twitch streams. Once purchased, please email 0xracingdao@gmail.com to complete the process. After sponsorship period, this token will convert to a Proof of Sponsorship collectible.
